original_text: How he went into the house of God, and did take and eat the shewbread, and gave also to them that were with him; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone?
korean_text: 그가 하나님의 전에 들어가서 다만 제사장 외에는 먹어서는 안 되는 진설병을 먹고 함께 한 자들에게도 주지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: How he went into the house of God
and did take and eat shewbread
and gave also to them that were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그와 함께 있던 자들에게도 주었는가

sentences.original_text: which it is not lawful to eat
